title: Buggy Sensor Box
detail: Data collection sensor box for buggy rolls
extended_details: The data collection box will be used by various buggy orgs to collect data about the course and individual drivers' rolls. Each box will contain collect data from GPS, IMU, and stereo cameras. We plan to use this data to improve the autonomous localization algorithm, as well as collect more data from multiple buggy rolls to build a better model of the course.
